section.title: Apache Forrest - Baetle Plugin
section.p: Rendering Baetle, the RDF vocabulary to describe the content of bug databases.

section.title: Samples
section.note: This plugin is in an early development stage.
section.p: This section includes samples that have been made available so far to demonstrate the existing functionalities of the plugin.

section.title: Issues
section.p: JIRA generates an XML file for each issue. This plugin transforms that XML file into Baetle (RDF/XML). Then, the Baetle is transformed into Forrest Document format.
The following map enables the plugin to process any issue in Apache bug database.
section.note: The above map is included in the locationmap, which is by default located in {properties:content}.
